channel.title: (RSDW) 508 Starters Pack 508 (RSDW)
channel.description:
Hey im DemonWars, Owner and coder of RuneScape DemonWars.
Besides that im working on a v2.5 i am also making a server and client for people who just started coding and don't know alot of it.
This will be a Server and a Client that will have alot of extras that will make coding alot easier. Like:
1: a simple command that will generate 3 files that includes a NPC's dialoge and name. 2: a simple command that will generate a NPC on your current location by only having to add the NPC ID. 3: a simple command that will generate a file that includes a giant code that will add a new item by simply having to add the model ID and the item ID.
More info is coming.
Please reply with ideas and/or comments
Greetzz DemonWars

item.title: (RSDW) 508 Starters Pack 508 (RSDW)

item.description:
@DemonWars wrote:

Hey im DemonWars, Owner and coder of RuneScape DemonWars.

Besides that im working on a v2.5 i am also making a server and client for people who just started coding and don’t know alot of it.

This will be a Server and a Client that will have alot of extras that will make coding alot easier.
Like:

1: a simple command that will generate 3 files that includes a NPC’s dialoge and name.
2: a simple command that will generate a NPC on your current location by only having to add the NPC ID.
3: a simple command that will generate a file that includes a giant code that will add a new item by simply having to add the model ID and the item ID.

More info is coming.

Please reply with ideas and/or comments

Greetzz DemonWars
